views.markdown:
2.0.1: In this version: - Filtering by any column; - Easier column management; - Fiddling with iOS 10 (please give feedback). 2.0.0-309: In this version:
- Fixed RAM usage, now shows free memory;
- Modules page revamped;
- Kernel extensions are listed for kernel task;
- Optimized Ports and Files pages;
- Indication of linked pipes & sockets.

1.0.0-204: In this version:
- Mach ports page added;
- Changing values are highlighed;
- Real thread names are shown;
- Lots of small improvements;
- Fixed icon.
1.0.0-6: At last, an update! In this version:
- New icon, finally!
- Per-process network statistics;
- Process summary page;
- Real-time threads & dispatch queues page;
- Added verbose descriptions about each data column;
- Added a quick guide;
- The Story is updated ;)
1.0.0-5: CocoaTop is becoming a professional tool. In this version:
- Per-process dynamic libraries view;
- Support for iOS5 (for the iPad 1 people);
- Real-time disk usage statistics (iOS 7+);
- New column presets!
1.0.0-4: This is a MEGA release! Featuring:
- Open files/sockets view;
- iOS 7 style, iOS 6 still supported;
- Fullscreen mode (two-finger tap);
- Table footer with summary;
- Column presets;
- New info in columns.
In this version you can kill processes.

This version supports wide iPhone 5 and 6 screens.
